Notes: Creates and controls the sequence used when the player returns to a HUB world with a Grand Star. It does not appear initially, but it can appear through cutscene actions.

Rail.Description: The fly-in path used at the start of the cutscene.

GeneralPos.Description: ゲート中心 specifies the point that the Grand Star will move to.

Camera.Description: Uses multiple cameras for different actions. 移動 is used for the fly-in sequence and リザルト is used for the result text sequence. The game also registers a camera action under the name ウェイト but this is never used.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene.
